comments.comment: Quality is good. Thin material but good for wear. Cotton material.
It was comfortable and the cloth material was also of good quality it's worth thr price, must buy
Goos product febric is nice look good I like the product
Fitting is great and the material feels good on the skin.

These lounge pants are exactly what I've been looking for! The fit is spot on - comfortable without being baggy. The material is excellent quality cloth, super soft and breathable, making them perfect for relaxing at home. 

One detail I really appreciate is the right pocket having a zipper. It gives me peace of mind knowing my phone or keys are secure if I'm lounging around. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase from Myntra. These pants are comfy, well-made, and have thoughtful features - highly recommend!

The fit was a bit wide? I would say like umm oversized jeans kind of thing, i expected it to be a bit slim fit type but anyways, the quality is amazing and the fabric and comfort is 5/5 and is the only reason I didn't send it back, i was thinking of it since i don't like oversized fashion kinda thing but the comfort was too good.

If you are looking for a pair of trackpants that can be worn everywhere  you can definitely order this product. If have been using it for 3 months and the quality of fabric, colour and comfort is same as I got it when I recieved it .
Fully satisfied.
I had ordered L size.
Fitting is a bit relaxed and not slim fit. But the quality is best for price. Go for it if you want something that is relaxed fit.
Absolutely loved it. It has a straight-er fit compared to other track pants. Pure cotton, amazing fit. Will probably order another pair.

Very nyc product and quality is also good.
Go for it 👍
Good material is used in this product but the price is more we’re as many companies provide this type of product in good price point
This track pant looks very elegant and premium quality totally worth for the money

product_desc: Made of soft, lightweight breathable jersey fabric. Tapered designs fits well and gives you more mobility. An elastic waistband with a drawcord for a snug and easy fit. Zip pockets on both sides the two stripes on the side seam gives it a sporty look.Key Feature:1.The waistband is made from high-quality elastic to ensure maximum flexibility and lasts really long. The waistband string helps to securely fasten the Pants.2.No-marks guarantee with soft anti-roll, microfiber waistband on the inside with comfort stretch. Enhanced with anti-microbial finish to prevent unpleasant odours and rashes.3.These lounge pants have two convenient side pockets so that it's easy to carry around your mobile phone, keys, cash and other essential items.4.These lounge pants are made from 100% Cotton and has a relaxed fit & medium rise. Can be worn as a Pajama, Lounge wear, Leisure wear and Sleep wear.5.These pants are very easy to take care of. A regular machine wash and dry in shade is recommended. Do not use bleach or any coloring agents.
pd_material: Regular-fitThe model (height 6') is wearing a size S
pdp_name: Men Black Solid Regular Fit Athleisure Cotton Lounge Pants

comments.comment: Absolutely great pyjamas. A league above the Jockey ones, in terms of material, fit and design. Very comfortable and chic at the same time. Go for it.

Fit & material are excellent, so comfortable as I used it for daily wear as well some semi formal events. 
Comfy piece to have in a wardrobe.
Nice one , Colour and fitting is same as the pic but only doubt is colour fading after wash i will edit my review
Fit is good and so is the material so it feels relaxing after wearing. But the cloth is quite thin so it is good for summers but not so much for winters esp. of Northern India.

Size is little tight jitna mereko lag rha tha , knees and thighs are tight
But product is awesome mereko bhaut acha laga 
I am confused about size but now its comfortable  and amazing

As show in the pictures with Shine and being a lounge product , The Picture is DECIEVING , no shine at all , this is the first time had such experience withMyntra , though product , colour,  fit is quite good, just not that shown in the pictures, Now don't reply with answers that light makes it shine n all , thank you , still very pleased with Myntra way above other app
Such a lovely track pant. Most suited to Bridegrooms. However, being 100% cotton wrinkles does hurt the look. After all I am extremely comfortable with the quality. Loved it!
Overall material is good. Fitting is also quite good and. Proper. Colour same as shown in the picture. Comfort wise also good and overall quality is good and justify the price.

product_desc: Checked mid-rise lounge pants, has an inner elasticated waistband with Drawstring closure, three pocketsFeatures:Everyday Essentials: XYXX checkered pyjamas are a must-have for every man. Wear these lounge bottoms when working from home, sleeping, walking the dog, reading, or practicing yoga. Intelli-Ease fabric technology ensures unmatched lightness, softness, and breathability.Break the Monotony: XYXX checkered pyjamas come in a checkered pattern that adds more style than plain loungewear options. The checkered style with relaxed, pant-like fitting is beautifully complemented by drawstrings for a laidback yet stylish look.Because Comfort Matters: Super-combed cotton allows more air circulation. The soft-on-skin combed cotton does not have short threads that tend to stick out and prick the skin. The soft, anti-roll microfiber waistbands don't leave any marks on the skin.All Day Wear: Our cotton pyjamas complement every lifestyle. An anti-microbial finish keeps away odours and rashes. There is sufficient room to carry daily-use items like car keys, wallet, cash, or cards with concealed zippered side pockets and a patch pocket at the back.Specifications: XYXX checkered pyjamas True-to-size fitting.
pd_material: The model (height 6') is wearing a size S
pdp_name: Men Checked Cotton Lounge Pants

Very good product. Value for money..
Also delivery is super fast. Thank you so much for Fast delivery
The fabric is very soft and comfortable. My waist is 34 and I ordered XL. I will recommend to order a bigger size if you like loose and comfortable fit.

as somebody wrote here, if you want L- go for XL size.. my waist is 34, normally I go for L, I tried all 3 sizes, M-L-XL, 
per their size chart, I could have used M.. anyway XL is comfortable, a good size for me.. not too tight... the material is not cheap ( like 499 ones).. i am 5'10 but and still it's a little big in length. I ll shorten the length.

These are very good quality material. The cotton is pure and does not cause any irritation whatsoever. 
However the sizes are inconsistent. While XL suits me in light blue colour, I had to go for XXL in dark blue colour. Hence advise you to go for a size higher, to be safe.
With great brand comes the great product very comfortable, just the pajamas you need for daily wear, and maybe sometime if you're keen for a pajama party..just go for it.

Bought this for my husband who is quite fussy about his pj’s. He was very satisfied with this product. Just the right length. Got nice pockets too.  Looks smart so it can even be worn outside for a casual outing. Soft material but it looks like a denim pant so can easily be worn out too. Its a smart attire

I loved this cotton lounge pant so much. Material is good and very much comfortable. This is very soft and you can wear it whole day without getting irritated. After washing colour of this pant remains same.  I strongly recommend it for use. You can also gift this to your loved ones without any doubt.

This pant is cool, classy and stylish. The design is very impressive. Has a very rich luxurious feel to it. The material is soft and comfortable. The fit is perfect too.

These men's straight leg cotton pants are a game-changer! The comfort level is unmatched, thanks to the soft cotton fabric that feels incredibly gentle against the skin. The straight leg design adds a touch of style, making them versatile for lounging at home or running errands. The perfect blend of comfort and fashion, these pants have quickly become my go-to choice for relaxation. Highly recommended!

The men's long straight lounge pants offer a comfortable and relaxed fit, perfect for lounging at home or running errands. The straight-leg design provides a modern look while allowing freedom of movement. The pants are crafted from soft, breathable fabric, ensuring comfort throughout the day. With their versatile style and cozy feel, these lounge pants are a great addition to any casual wardrobe.

Comfortable and versatile, these straight leg cotton lounge pants are a must-have for cozy days at home or casual outings. The soft fabric feels great against the skin, and the relaxed fit ensures unrestricted movement. Perfect for lounging or running errands in style.

The XYXX Men's Straight-Leg Cotton Lounge Pants offer both comfort and style for casual wear or lounging at home. Made from high-quality cotton, these pants are soft and breathable, ensuring maximum comfort throughout the day. The straight-leg design provides a relaxed fit, allowing for ease of movement.

product_desc:
Made of soft, lightweight breathable jersey fabric. Tapered designs fits well and gives you more mobility. An elastic waistband with a drawcord for a snug and easy fit. Zip pockets on both sides the two stripes on the side seam gives it a sporty look.
Key Feature:
1.The waistband is made from high-quality elastic to ensure maximum flexibility and lasts really long. The waistband string helps to securely fasten the Pants.
2.No-marks guarantee with soft anti-roll, microfiber waistband on the inside with comfort stretch. Enhanced with anti-microbial finish to prevent unpleasant odours and rashes.
3.These lounge pants have two convenient side pockets so that it's easy to carry around your mobile phone, keys, cash and other essential items.
4.These lounge pants are made from 100% Cotton and has a relaxed fit & medium rise. Can be worn as a Pajama, Lounge wear, Leisure wear and Sleep wear.
5.These pants are very easy to take care of. A regular machine wash and dry in shade is recommended. Do not use bleach or any coloring agents.
